subject: Pedals ebay
description_text:
Hi, I have a question regarding this offer
https://www.ebay.pl/itm/388484542442?_skw=simsonn&itmmeta=01K29VFTVJMQQFMHEXEQJ9W2CY&hash=item5a737bafea:g:IhoAAOSwbsFoN8mC&itmprp=enc%3AAQAKAAAAwFkggFvd1GGDu0w3yXCmi1faFgRHv3ZgRRzwI5P2LO2Uu62iOlOKsMcA--4sA8mEQbKQU0Nar8m6NBrmgHfjsR02FwA7MaEJ3212Hm7hhEFwaMQn6cobG9IDny%2BjHCkKtsB%2Bqbm9WOSdoEniqavNNDVvV7OXvaeajAAxik%2FvlGIZGxBTnCUlWF8NpojeOL8kYjNb4mO5QWHL0xD7wfQ2%2FDc%2B4FHMscgZgYs9Wr87p4k5j4KVM%2BY9q8diHGQNicJmDA%3D%3D%7Ctkp%3ABk9SR_Stv7uSZg.
Are there any additional costs like customs duty or VAT applied when
shipping to Poland?

conversations.body_text: Hi Mateusz Ubraniak,    If there are no customs duties, we will need to ship from our Germany or France stock. However, it is currently out of stock, and the latest batch is expected to arrive around August 15th.

So this is the price for the finished product including all fees, and the
shipment will be on August 15th or later, right?

niedz., 10 sie 2025 o 13:30 service@simsonn.com
Hi Mateusz Ubraniak,    You can confirm again on August 15th, or place an order on our official website at that time.
Hi Mateusz Ubraniak,     The German warehouse now has stock available. You can place your order through this Amazon link.Â   https://www.amazon.pl/dp/B0FMF87H36
